bilingual.source: The road forms a cross intersection ahead.
bilingual.target: 这条路在前方形成一个十字形交叉口。

bilingual.source: The document includes a cross-reference to the appendix.
bilingual.target: 该文件包含对附录的交叉引用。

bilingual.source: The witness was evasive during the cross-examination.
bilingual.target: 证人在交叉询问中表现得回避的。

bilingual.source: The index provides a cross-reference to related terms.
bilingual.target: 索引提供了相关术语的交叉引用。

bilingual.source: The detective cross-examined the suspect to uncover the truth.
bilingual.target: 侦探交叉询问嫌疑人以揭示真相。

bilingual.source: Using a pair of serving chopsticks can prevent cross-contamination.
bilingual.target: 用一双公筷可以避免交叉感染。

bilingual.source: Please cross-reference the data with the previous report.
bilingual.target: 请将数据与之前的报告进行交叉引用。

bilingual.source: You should cross-reference your sources to ensure accuracy.
bilingual.target: 你应该交叉引用你的资料以确保准确性。

bilingual.source: During the cross-examination, the witness became visibly nervous.
bilingual.target: 在交叉询问期间，证人明显变得紧张。

bilingual.source: During the trial, the defendant was cross-examined by the prosecutor.
bilingual.target: 在审判期间，被告被检察官交叉询问。

list.abstract: cross是美国制笔业中最具收藏价值的老古董，从1846年起便开始为珍爱传统美感的品味人士，制作永不退流行的的优质书写工具。各式精美的CROSS书写工具均展现出典雅、优质与顶级的品味。
作为一种汽车设计理念，Cross指的是综合多个汽车品类的特点，跨平台或跨功能地开发带来更多驾乘乐趣的新车型。

yingyinNormal.en: Fingers crossed. Which is ironic, because if you had Fowler's palsy, you wouldn't be able to cross your fingers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 十指交叉为你祈祷。讽刺的是，如果一旦患上福勒瘫，你的双手将无法十指交叉。

yingyinNormal.en: And then what I've done is I've cross-referenced them by subject. Right? So if you're looking up, let's say birthdays and dogs, you get Photo 152. See?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经依照主题，做好了交叉搜寻，好比你要找生日和狗，就会找到152号相片，你看。

yingyinNormal.en: Cross your heart. Do it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对着胸口画十字，划啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I could help you cross your porch. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以帮你穿过走廊。不用。

yingyinNormal.en: It's like a cross between caramel and treacle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 像焦糖和糖浆的混合味道。

yingyinNormal.en: But none of this explains why I couldn't cross over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些都不能解释我为什么过不了桥。

yingyinNormal.en: Promise you won't leave him? Yeah. Cross your heart?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你保证不会丢下他? 我保证。在胸前划十字?

yingyinNormal.en: And still know absolutely nothing. I'm late to meet Cross.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但仍然一无所知，我见克罗斯要迟到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Everything is broken down into the categories, then cross-referenced.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的东西都按类别分开，可以互相引用。

yingyinNormal.en: Swear you'll take us there. Cross your heart. Cross it. Cross your heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 发誓你会带我们去的，向胸口画十字，画啊，向胸口画十字。

yingyinNormal.en: Cross my heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，划十字。

yingyinNormal.en: There's no cross-talk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不许插话。

yingyinNormal.en: I could help you cross the street. No. I could help you cross your yard? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以牵着你过马路。不需要。我可以帮你穿过院子? 不用。

yingyinNormal.en: I took on a young protege called Darren Cross. Darren Cross. He's a big deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我收了一个年轻学生叫达伦·克罗斯。达伦·克罗斯，他可是个风云人物。

yingyinNormal.en: That's a line in the sand we cannot cross. We will cross it, eventually. So why keep fighting it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是不可跨越的界限。我们最终还得跨，所以何必争下去呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I gotta help you cross something. No, I'm doing fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是我总要帮你做些什么吧。不用，我可以自己顾自己。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a magazine in the ladies' waiting room at King's Cross.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国王十字车站的女士候车室里有份杂志。

yingyinNormal.en: That's your side and this is my side. Do not cross the invisible line.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那边是你的，而这一边是我的地盘。不许跨过这条隐形的界线。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't swim like the fish, so we conceived boats to cross the oceans.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们无法像鱼一样游水，于是我们造船横渡海洋。

yingyinNormal.en: The Japs deliberately target the wounded. Lose all your red cross markings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日本鬼专门袭击伤员。去掉你所有的红十字标志。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 穿过; 横过; 越过
杂交; 杂种; 混合物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: go across from one side of something to the other
sense_info_list.zh: 穿过; 横过; 越过

examination_example.sentence: One <highlight>cross</highlight>-generation mark of a successful life is having a family with children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成功人生的一个跨代标志是有一个有孩子的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: The first shiploads of immigrants bound for the territory which is now the United States <highlight>crossed</highlight> the Atlantic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一艘满载移民的航船横跨大西洋，驶向这片土地，即当今的美国。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, this period of economic weakness may reinforce class divides, and decrease opportunities to <highlight>cross</highlight> them — especially for young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，这一时期的经济疲软可能会加剧阶层分化，减少跨越阶层分化的机会——尤其是对年轻人而言。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>cross</highlight>-check sources and prefer news from different perspectives — especially those that are open about any bias.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们交叉核对新闻来源，更愿意接受从不同视角解读的新闻——尤其是那些对一切偏袒看法兼收并蓄的新闻。

examination_example.sentence: And in Europe, some are up in arms over a proposal to integrate it within <highlight>cross</highlight>-cutting topics of sustainable development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在欧洲，一些人强烈反对将其整合到可持续发展的跨领域主题中。

sense_info_list.zh: 杂交; 杂种; 混合物

word_affix.word_mean: n. 十字形（或叉形）记号

word_usage.usage:
across是介词，通常跟在动词后，如 run across the road 跑着穿过马路；
cross是动词，通常直接跟名词，如 cross the road 穿过马路。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 交叉处；十字路口；道口；杂交；横渡；横越；人行横道；横穿处；过境处；中殿和耳堂相交处
n. 十字路口；交叉路；岔道

word_family.mean: n. 十字形（或叉形）记号；十字形物；十字架；杂种；侧向的移动；磨难；混合物；叉

sense_info_list.en: go across from one side of something to the other
sense_info_list.zh: 穿过; 横跨; 横向的

examination_example.sentence: It has not yet explored the <highlight>cross</highlight>-cultural aspect of sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还没有探索睡眠的跨文化方面。

examination_example.sentence: The first woman to <highlight>cross</highlight> the English Channel was Gertrude Ederle in 1926.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1926年，格特鲁德·埃德尔成为第一位横渡英吉利海峡的女性。

examination_example.sentence: Angry feelings warn us that someone is stepping on our toes, <highlight>crossing</highlight> a boundary, or violating our trust.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 愤怒的情绪警告我们，有人踩了我们的脚，越过了界限，或违背了我们的信任。

examination_example.sentence: These beams formed the <highlight>cross</highlight>-shaped roof that ran the length of the central part of the cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些横梁构成了横跨大教堂中心部分的十字形屋顶。

sense_info_list.zh: 生气的; 坏脾气的; 惹恼

word_affix.word_mean: n. 十字形（或叉形）记号

word_usage.usage:
cross与across的用法区别：
cross作动词，可单独表示穿越动作，而across的词性为介词或副词，需与实义动词连用才能表示穿越动作。
示例：我用10分钟就过了河。
正 I crossed the river in 10 minutes.
正 I swam across the river in 10 minutes.

examination_example.sentence: As I was considering all this, a press release from a respected research firm <highlight>crossed</highlight> my desk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在我考虑这一切的时候，一份来自一家受人尊敬的研究公司的新闻稿掠过我的办公桌。

examination_example.sentence: How a growth mindset of interest can contribute to <highlight>cross-disciplinary</highlight> thinking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对兴趣持成长型心态是怎样帮助跨学科思考的。

examination_example.sentence: If we are to understand how much our cognitive lives differ <highlight>cross-culturally</highlight>, we must continually explore the depths of our species' linguistic diversity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们想了解我们的认知生活在跨文化上有多大的差异，我们必须不断探索我们物种语言多样性的深度。

examination_example.sentence: Companies are abandoning conventional functional departments and organizing employees into <highlight>cross-disciplinary</highlight> teams that focus on particular products, problems or customers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司正在放弃传统的职能部门，将员工组织成关注特定产品、问题或客户的跨学科团队。

examination_example.sentence: The tractor was resting against the crash barrier in the central reservation, having miraculously (奇迹般地) <highlight>crossed</highlight> the busy road with fast-flowing traffic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拖拉机正靠在中央保护区的防撞护栏上，奇迹般地穿过了车流湍急的繁忙道路。

examination_example.sentence: One day we <highlight>cross</highlight> into Belgium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天我们进入比利时。

examination_example.sentence: On day 3 we <highlight>cross</highlight> into Belgium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第三天，我们进入比利时。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: go across from one side of something to the other
sense_info_list.zh: 穿过; 横跨; 横向的

examination_example.sentence: I saw it create a bridge to <highlight>cross</highlight> a deep (深的) hole.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看到它架起了一座桥来横跨一个深洞。

examination_example.sentence: Never <highlight>cross</highlight> (横穿) the street when the red light is on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 红灯亮时切勿横穿马路。

examination_example.sentence: Why did Alan <highlight>cross</highlight> the desert on foot?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 艾伦为什么要徒步穿越沙漠？

examination_example.sentence: Next they stuck the paper on the <highlight>cross</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接着他们把纸贴在十字架上。

examination_example.sentence: It was at an exhibition of the artist's works organized by the Red <highlight>Cross</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那是在红十字会组织的艺术家作品展上。

word_affix.word_mean: n. 十字形（或叉形）记号

word_usage.usage:
cross与across的用法区别：
cross作动词，可单独表示穿越动作，而across的词性为介词或副词，需与实义动词连用才能表示穿越动作。
示例：我用10分钟就过了河。
正 I crossed the river in 10 minutes.
正 I swam across the river in 10 minutes.
